msbt.message: Our competition got pretty intense the other day, didn't it? I'm sending a little prize I wasn't able to pass along to you at the time. I hope we can play again one of these days!
I got so excited playing that game with you the other day, I think I'm STILL sweating from it! Also, I've sent you the fruit I owe you. We should play again sometime!

I really enjoyed our game the other day. Please take this because, as they say, "to Victor go the spoils." (Which I think is true whether or not your name is Victor.) Anyway, let's play again one of these days.
